data.name: Red Trigger 2
data.detailed_description:
Red Trigger 2 is a First Person Shooter (FPS) Puzzle Game.

The game takes place directly after the events of the original Red Trigger. You incarnate a virus called Red Trigger and try to take down a digital server, in which each inhabitant seems to have some type of physical or mental pain. For most of the adventure, you'll be accompanied by a mysterious sassy cat named Off Guard and, together, you'll try to uncover the dark secrets of this universe. To do so, you'll use a handy gun that has the ability to expand or retract red blocks when those are shot, but you can only expand three blocks at a time, so you will need to manage your energy wisely. Those red blocks can be used in many different ways, like making platforms, blocking lasers, holding doors open, powering systems, propelling yourself, and more.

Contrary to the first game, Red Trigger 2 not only has a big focus on gameplay, but also on storytelling. All the characters are fully voice-acted and are full of personality. You'll meet one of them in each themed biome of the game, which you can tackle in almost any order you want. After corrupting a biome, you return to the central HUB and choose the next one you want to explore. In each biome, you'll find a new ability that will let you explore more parts of the HUB. For each biome, you'll also need to defeat a boss and corrupt that section of the map. Beware, this won't be easy, as you'll need to do an escape sequence to return to safety as each biome crumbles.

Red Trigger 2 is about 10 times bigger than the original Red Trigger, and will be priced.

To keep updated on all our news, follow us on social media on Facebook or Twitter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
